Layer.Title: Indices
Layer.Abstract: Median averaged indices produced from composite Landsat & Sentinel ARD imagery

Layer.Name: 10DayIndices
Layer.Title: mdc 10 Day Indices
Layer.Abstract: 10 Day median averaged indices produced from composite Landsat & Sentinel ARD imagery

Style.Name: ndvi
Style.Title: NDVI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDVI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: ndsi
Style.Title: NDSI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDSI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: ndwi
Style.Title: NDWI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDWI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: nddi
Style.Title: NDDI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDDI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Layer.Name: MonthIndices
Layer.Title: mdc Month Indices
Layer.Abstract: Monthly median averaged indices produced from composite Landsat & Sentinel ARD imagery

Style.Name: ndvi
Style.Title: NDVI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDVI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: ndsi
Style.Title: NDSI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDSI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: ndwi
Style.Title: NDWI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDWI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: nddi
Style.Title: NDDI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDDI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Layer.Name: ModisIndices
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS indices
Layer.Abstract: MODIS Median value of NDVI, NDWI, NDDI in a 10days period L3 Grid 250m

Style.Name: ndvi
Style.Title: NDVI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDVI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: ndwi
Style.Title: NDWI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDWI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Style.Name: nddi
Style.Title: NDDI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDDI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Layer.Name: ModisNDSI
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS NDSI
Layer.Abstract: MODIS Median value of NDSI in a 10days period L3 Grid 500m

Style.Name: ndsi
Style.Title: NDSI Band
Style.Abstract: Median averaged NDSI image from composite Landsat & Sentinel imagery

Layer.Title: Products
Layer.Abstract: Products derived from indices contained within the MDC

Layer.Name: 10DayAnomaly
Layer.Title: mdc Anomaly
Layer.Abstract: 10 Day Pasture anomaly product comparing current pasture condition with the long term median

Style.Name: anomaly
Style.Title: Anomaly Band
Style.Abstract: Pasture anomaly comparing current pasture condition to long term median

Layer.Name: MonthAnomaly
Layer.Title: mdc Month Anomaly
Layer.Abstract: Monthly Pasture anomaly product comparing current pasture condition with the long term median

Style.Name: anomaly
Style.Title: Anomaly Band
Style.Abstract: Pasture anomaly comparing current pasture condition to long term median

Layer.Name: ModisAnomaly
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS Anomaly
Layer.Abstract: Comparisons of pasture data, comparing the most recent period to the long term median. Takes most recent 10 Day period and also collects and creates a median averaged dataset from the historical timeseries. Converts both datasets from NDVI to pasture (kg/ha) values and divides the current dataset by the historical one to calculate the pasture anomaly.

Style.Name: anomaly
Style.Title: Anomaly Band
Style.Abstract: Pasture anomaly comparing current pasture condition to long term median

Layer.Name: ModisSeasonalAnomaly
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS Seasonal Anomaly
Layer.Abstract: Average Pasture Anomaly from May to October. Using MODIS and VIIRS data

Style.Name: seasonal_anomaly
Style.Title: Seasonal Anomaly Band
Style.Abstract: Pasture anomaly comparing current pasture condition to long term median

Layer.Name: 10DayTrend
Layer.Title: mdc Trend
Layer.Abstract: 10 Day pasture trend product comparing current pasture condition with previous time period

Style.Name: trend
Style.Title: Trend Band
Style.Abstract: Pasture trend comparing current pasture condition to the previous time period

Layer.Name: MonthTrend
Layer.Title: mdc Month Trend
Layer.Abstract: Monthly pasture trend product comparing current pasture condition with previous time period

Style.Name: trend
Style.Title: Trend Band
Style.Abstract: Pasture trend comparing current pasture condition to the previous time period

Layer.Name: ModisTrend
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS Trend
Layer.Abstract: Comparisons of pasture data, comparing the most recent time period to the time period before that, in order to get an understanding of how pasture conditions are changing. Data used covers 10 Day periods.

Style.Name: trend
Style.Title: Trend Band
Style.Abstract: Pasture trend comparing current pasture condition to the previous time period

Layer.Name: MonthPastureBiomass
Layer.Title: mdc Month Pasture
Layer.Abstract: Pasture biomass. Converts the NDVI to pasture (kg/ha) values.

Style.Name: pasture_biomass
Style.Title: Pasture Biomass
Style.Abstract: Composite Pasture Biomass in kg/ha

Layer.Name: ModisPastureBiomass
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS Pasture
Layer.Abstract: Pasture biomass. Converts the NDVI to pasture (kg/ha) values.

Style.Name: pasture_biomass
Style.Title: Pasture Biomass
Style.Abstract: Composite Pasture Biomass in kg/ha

Layer.Name: ModisLST
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS LST
Layer.Abstract: MODIS Median value of Land Surface Temperature in a 10days period L3

Style.Name: lst
Style.Title: LST Band
Style.Abstract: Land Surface Temperature band

Layer.Name: ModisRGB
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS RGB
Layer.Abstract: True colour composite image taking the last best pixel/geomedian from a 10day period.

Style.Name: rgb
Style.Title: RGB Band
Style.Abstract: Simple true-colour image, using the red, green and blue bands

Layer.Name: S2RGB
Layer.Title: mdc S2 RGB
Layer.Abstract: True colour composite image taking the last best pixel from the last month.

Style.Name: rgb
Style.Title: RGB Band
Style.Abstract: Simple true-colour image, using the red, green and blue bands

Layer.Name: ModisSnowCover
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS Snow Cover
Layer.Abstract: Snow Mask for a 10day period. Binary mask with 1=snow, 0=no_snow, 255=nodata

Style.Name: snow_cover
Style.Title: Snow Cover
Style.Abstract: Binary snow cover band

Layer.Name: MonthSnowPercentage
Layer.Title: mdc Month Snow Percentage
Layer.Abstract: Snow Percentage for a monthly period. Valid range values [0-100], where the value represent the percentage of times that a pixel had snow.

Style.Name: snow_percentage
Style.Title: Snow Percentage
Style.Abstract: Snow Percentage band covering snow cover over multiple time periods

Layer.Name: ModisSnowPercentage
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS Snow Percentage
Layer.Abstract: Snow Percentage for a 10day period. Valid range values [0-100], where the value represent the percentage of times that a pixel had snow.

Style.Name: snow_percentage
Style.Title: Snow Percentage
Style.Abstract: Snow Percentage band covering snow cover over multiple time periods

Layer.Name: ModisVCI
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS VCI
Layer.Abstract: Vegetation Condition Index for a 10day period. The VCI compares the current NDVI to the long-term minimum and maximum values of NDVI. VCI values range [0,1]

Style.Name: vci
Style.Title: VCI
Style.Abstract: Vegetation Condition Index (VCI) band

Layer.Name: ModisTCI
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS TCI
Layer.Abstract: Temperature Condition Index for a 10day period. The TCI compares the current LST to the long-term minimum and maximum values of LST.

Style.Name: tci
Style.Title: TCI
Style.Abstract: Temperature Condition Index (TCI) band

Layer.Name: ModisVHI
Layer.Title: mdc MODIS VHI
Layer.Abstract: Vegetation Health Index for a 10day period. The VHI is a combination of VCI and TCI, and it is mainly used for monitoring drought.

Style.Name: vhi
Style.Title: VHI
Style.Abstract: Vegetation Health Index (VHI) band

Layer.Name: DzudRisk
Layer.Title: mdc Dzud Risk
Layer.Abstract: Dzud risk map produced by the Agrometeorology department of IRIMHE, UB, Mongolia.

Style.Name: dzud_risk
Style.Title: Dzud Risk
Style.Abstract: Dzud risk map produced by the Agrometeorology department of IRIMHE, UB, Mongolia.
